name: Mariusz Jan Skobel
profile_summary:
Senior Project Engineer with 10+ years of experience in healthcare software solutions and a strong command of **HL7**, **ETL**, **SQL**, and **Oracle**. Proficient in integrating laboratory information systems and optimizing performance for critical healthcare applications. Skilled in leveraging **Windows**, **IIS**, and **Citrix** for secure deployments, with expertise in **Virtualization** and **VMware** to enhance system reliability and scalability. Demonstrated ability to solve complex problems in fast-paced environments while ensuring compliance with industry regulations.

As a Full Stack Developer, I possess hands-on experience with **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**, consistently delivering high-performance software solutions in both healthcare and finance sectors. Experienced in building and deploying cloud-native applications on **Azure** and **AWS**, I have led the development of enterprise platforms that incorporate AI/ML capabilities. My strong background in microservices architecture and CI/CD automation emphasizes secure and maintainable solutions, driving real-world impact through efficient and innovative design.

experience.responsibilities:
•	Managed and optimized ETL processes using **Oracle** and **Firebird** for efficient data flow in Healthcare project implementations, ensuring compliance with HL7 standards for seamless information exchange.
•	Developed and integrated SQL queries for Laboratory Information Systems, enhancing data accessibility and reporting capabilities in line with regulatory requirements in healthcare.
•	Implemented virtualization solutions using **VMware** to improve resource management and deployment efficiency across multiple environments in healthcare settings.
•	Directed communication strategies and fostered teamwork among cross-functional teams to solve complex project challenges related to **Healthcare** technology solutions.
•	Conducted root cause analysis on system failures and implemented robust problem-solving methodologies to enhance system uptime and service reliability.
•	Optimized performance of Windows servers and IIS configurations for improved application delivery and security compliance in healthcare applications.
•	Utilized networking skills involving TCP/IP protocols to ensure secure and reliable data transmission across systems and devices in healthcare environments.
•	Led the deployment of business intelligence (BI) tools to visualize laboratory data and improve operational efficiency, generating insights to drive decision-making processes.
•	Spearheaded the use of Citrix and Terminal Services to facilitate remote access to critical laboratory systems, enhancing operational continuity and flexibility.
•	Collaborated with teams to implement Unix-based systems for enhanced performance in backend processing of healthcare data.

Utilized **ETL** processes to facilitate data ingestion and integration for Laboratory Information Systems, enhancing data accessibility and reporting accuracy within the healthcare domain.
Developed and maintained secure databases using **Oracle** and **Firebird**, ensuring data integrity and compliance with industry standards in healthcare applications.
Implemented communication protocols over **TCP/IP** to optimize data transfer processes and improve integration with various health information systems and devices.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to identify and resolve problems, fostering effective **teamwork** and leveraging proactive **problem-solving** strategies to enhance project delivery.
Performed virtualization solutions using **VMware** to consolidate IT resources, increase efficiency, and reduce operational costs in lab environments.
Contributed to developing **BI** solutions that transformed complex datasets into insightful analytics, supporting clinical decision-making and strategic planning.
Interfaced with Citrix and **Terminal Server** technologies to ensure seamless access to laboratory applications for end-users, enhancing their productivity and experience.
Leveraged **Windows** and **Unix** systems to optimize system performance and security across laboratory systems, driving operational excellence in healthcare settings.

Utilized **SQL** and **Oracle** for effective ETL processes, ensuring data integrity and smooth integration for laboratory information systems.
Collaborated effectively with cross-functional teams, leveraging strong **communication** skills and **teamwork** to enhance project deliverables in a fast-paced healthcare environment.
Designed and developed innovative solutions for laboratory management using **GestLab** and **Firebird**, improving operational efficiency by up to **30%**.
Applied **Windows** and **Unix** environments, optimizing systems for performance, and ensuring seamless operation of laboratory systems across **TCP/IP** networks.
Implemented virtualization technologies like **VMware** to enhance system reliability and resource optimization, supporting cost-effective infrastructure management.
Managed internal and external communications for project progress updates, employing **problem-solving** techniques to address bottlenecks and enhance team collaboration.
Utilized **Citrix** and **Terminal Server** for remote management of laboratory systems, improving user accessibility and experience.
Conducted training sessions on **HL7** standards and laboratory workflows, ensuring all team members understood system integrations and data communication protocols.
Monitored and evaluated key performance metrics leveraging **BI** tools, leading to data-driven decisions that enhanced laboratory operations and reporting accuracy.
